remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 回发期间调用方法。The method is called during postback. 适配器可以选择处理事件。An adapter can choose to handle the event. 类不处理回发事件并始终返回 `false` 。The class does not handle the postback event and always returns `false`.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，如果希望页适配器处理回发事件，请 在处理事件后返回。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, if you want your page adapter to handle the postback event, return after handling the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查页的 属性。The method checks the property for the page. 如果该 属性不为空，则将 活动窗体的属性设置为 `false` 。If the property is not empty, the property for the active form is set to `false`. 方法在 退出之前调用基方法。The method calls the base method before exiting. > [!NOTE] > 属性继承自 类，该类提供 属性。The property inherits from the class, which provides the property.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基方法。

public: virtual void RenderUrlPostBackEvent(System::Web::UI::MobileControls::Adapters::XhtmlAdapters::XhtmlMobileTextWriter ^ writer, System::String ^ target, System::String ^ argument);

abstract member RenderUrlPostBackEvent : System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter * string * string -> unit override this.RenderUrlPostBackEvent : System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter * string * string -> unit

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个编写链接的 对象。

span.span: An object that writes the link.
The target URL for postback.

param.name: argument
param.span: 链接替换的事件的名称。

span.span: The name of the event for which the link is substituting.

summary.span: 在当前页上创建一个链接，以便在不支持回发事件的设备上实现回发。

span.span: Creates a link on the current page to enable postback on devices that do not support postback events.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设备只能对链接或按钮执行回发事件。Some devices are able to execute a postback event on a link or button only. 方法使用包含处理窗体和更新和显示页面所需的所有信息的 URL 编写一个链接。The method writes a link with a URL that contains all of the information that is required to process the form and to update and display the page.

related.span: ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体和 ASP.NET 兼容性
